fields_of_interest: Budget, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights
eu_initiatives: Active involvement in the work of the European Youth Forum and the Children's Right NGO Group.
organisation_name: International Falcon Movement - Socialist Educational International (IFM-SEI)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar

European Youth Forum (full member)

EU Forum on the Rights of the Child (selected member)

goals__remit:
The International Falcon Movement – Socialist Educational International is an international educational movement working to empower children and young people and fight for their rights.  
 
We are an umbrella movement for children and youth-led organisations all over the world, educating on the basis of our values of equality, democracy, peace, co-operation and friendship. 
 
Through our member organisations and the activities of our international, we aim to ensure children and young people are well informed about their rights and are empowered to ensure they are respected. To reach this goal, we organise a variety of activities including seminars and training courses, international camps, conferences and campaigns.
relevant_communication: Publication of several handbooks such as All Together Making Inclusion Happen, Peers Without Frontiers, Handbook for Action Against Climate Change, Volunteering Against Poverty, Peace Education, Rainbow Resources, Partnership for Participation, Gender Equality Handbook.
